thread.title: Nyc eventi
thread.title_full: Nyc eventi - Review of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gerrie G
title: Nyc eventi
text:
Hotel and staff were great. Waitress in restaurant not so great. Was not friendly and disappeared after she took our order. Had to ask other waitresses and waiters for items like water. When bill arrived she put it in front of youngest person at the table. Felt like she didn't care.
Room Tip: Shower handle was very stiff and hard to get to a good temperature but once you did you wanted to st... See more room tips
